data.text: @sadsacofk Depending on what variant you have, some of the at-home rapid tests won’t detect it

@sadsacofk Yeah, it's crazy. I've seen so many people say the same things. I didn't test when I had it last, because I'm a SAHM and just didn't go anywhere until symptoms were cleared, but that's definitely what we had lol
@RoyalCatLady If my PCR comes back negative I have to return to work but like I feel awful and I don’t want to expose more kids even though it’s in the classroom now
@sadsacofk I've read that a lot of people know they have it but haven't gotten a positive test result

@butwhatamess A student in my class tested positive last night and we have the EXACT same symptoms and he was crying and hugging me Thursday. I know I have covid. If my PCR comes back negative I’m gonna waste another rapid right after to check again but then I just have to go back to work 😅

@sadsacofk My tests (all 3) were negative and I was around my family christmas and 7 out of 10 tested positive the 2-3 days after. Negative for flu too but I had all the symptoms down to the loss of smell. It’s so weird & I have no explanation but I KNOW I had it then
